title: AI Strategy & Cortex Integration Discussion
body:
Had a productive discussion with Andy Weingardt and Brittany Biela about their AI strategy and how Domo fits with Cortex.

Key Points:

  • They're exploring AI integration for forecasting during Fall Hunting Classic
  • Currently using Churchill forecasting system with manual overrides
  • Brittany identified as strong champion - 'gets stuff done'

Next Steps:

  • Schedule dedicated AI strategy session
  • Prepare use case examples for AI-powered forecasting
  • Create Domo-Snowflake optimization roadmap
bodyPlain: Had a productive discussion with Andy Weingardt and Brittany Biela about their AI strategy and how Domo fits with Cortex. Key Points: They're exploring AI integration for forecasting during Fall Hunting Classic. Currently using Churchill forecasting system with manual overrides. Brittany identified as strong champion - 'gets stuff done'. Next Steps: Schedule dedicated AI strategy session. Prepare use case examples for AI-powered forecasting. Create Domo-Snowflake optimization roadmap.

opportunities: AI can enhance existing Churchill system

title: Paint Department SKU Analysis - Potential $1M/month Impact
body:
Met with Todd Budzinski from Merchandising to discuss paint department analytics.

Background: Todd has prior Domo experience from Target and is interested in using Domo for product placement optimization.

Opportunity: Phil mentioned this could impact "a million dollars a month" by optimizing impulse purchases around paint desk.

Technical Notes:

  • Working with 77 million records in BigQuery
  • Currently relying on Excel pivot tables
  • Todd wants to learn how to pull data directly from BigQuery tables
bodyPlain: Met with Todd Budzinski from Merchandising to discuss paint department analytics. Background: Todd has prior Domo experience from Target and is interested in using Domo for product placement optimization. Opportunity: Phil mentioned this could impact "a million dollars a month" by optimizing impulse purchases around paint desk. Technical Notes: Working with 77 million records in BigQuery. Currently relying on Excel pivot tables. Todd wants to learn how to pull data directly from BigQuery tables.

title: Snowflake OAuth & Performance Issues
body:
Troubleshooting session with Robert about Snowflake integration challenges.

Issues Identified:

  1. OAuth Authentication: Having trouble with Snowflake OAuth setup
  2. Performance: Large data volumes causing timeouts
  3. Robert mentioned: "trouble when I run the whole job just because of its size"

Action Items:

  • Schedule architecture assessment
  • Review Snowflake connector configuration
  • Implement query optimization best practices
bodyPlain: Troubleshooting session with Robert about Snowflake integration challenges. Issues Identified: 1. OAuth Authentication: Having trouble with Snowflake OAuth setup. 2. Performance: Large data volumes causing timeouts. Robert mentioned: "trouble when I run the whole job just because of its size". Action Items: Schedule architecture assessment. Review Snowflake connector configuration. Implement query optimization best practices.
